verbs.description: Hip - hip star Kanye West alienated millions of fans last week [ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MNR: openly] [V: declared] [ARG1: President Donald Trump " my brother "] and shared a photo of an autographed " Make America Great Again " hat .
